dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noFavoritesDescription: Star your containers or URLs in the management page to see them here.
dashboard.editModeDescription: Drag and drop shortcuts to reorder or move between sections.

containers.title: Docker Containers
containers.noContainersDescription: Start some Docker containers to see them here.

shortcuts.title: Custom Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Manual entries not linked to local containers.
shortcuts.noShortcutsDescription: Add URLs that aren't linked to containers.
shortcuts.dragDropImage: Drag & drop or click to upload
shortcuts.containerHasOnePort: Container has 1 port available, or enter a custom port
shortcuts.containerHasPorts: Container has {{count}} ports available, or enter a custom port
shortcuts.enterCustomOrUseAvailable: Enter custom port or use available ports
shortcuts.leaveEmptyNoPorts: Leave empty for containers that don't expose ports
shortcuts.tailscaleDescription: Access this service via your Tailscale network instead of local IP
shortcuts.imageUrlHint: Prefer direct links to PNG/SVG assets.

confirm.deleteShortcutMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this shortcut? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.deleteSectionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{sectionName}}"? Shortcuts in this section will be moved to "No Section".
confirm.stopContainerMessage: Are you sure you want to stop this container? This will terminate all active processes.

error.title: Error
error.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while saving the shortcut.
error.portUrlOrContainerRequired: Either Port, URL, or Container must be specified

migration.title: Update Container Icons & Descriptions
migration.description: Upgrade your shortcuts with enhanced icons and descriptions from the
migration.descriptionContinued: library. This migration will automatically fetch optimized icons and detailed descriptions for your containers. Select which icons and descriptions you want to update for each shortcut.
migration.name: Name

validation.invalidUrl: This is not a valid URL. Please enter a valid URL like example.com or https://example.com
validation.invalidPort: Please enter a valid port number between 1 and 65535.
validation.invalidPortNote: Note: Port is optional for containers that don't expose any ports.
validation.invalidImageUrl: This is not a valid URL. Please enter a valid image URL like https://example.com/image.png
